thread.title: Zenith@10: The hand of God made a difference -Daniel Asiedu
thread.title_full: Zenith@10: The hand of God made a difference -Daniel Asiedu

title: Zenith@10: The hand of God made a difference -Daniel Asiedu
text:
18:06 CET Zenith@10: The hand of God made a difference -Daniel Asiedu By MyJoyOnline 
As Zenith Bank celebrates 10 years, Managing Director of the bank Daniel Asiedu is attributing its successful operations to the bank's first core value – Belief in God. 
“The hand of God has made a difference”, Daniel Asiedu stressed on Joy FM Super Morning Show Tuesday after revealing that with some 700 customers in 2005. 
He said there are several awards that recognizes the importance the bank places on customer service. 
“We came in at a time when customers were asking for more” the Managing Director explained what informed the bank’s extreme focus on its clients. 
They couched the company’s vision with this in mind. Zenith wants "to be a reference point in the provision of prompt, flawless and innovative banking services in the Ghanaian Banking industry" 
According to Daniel Asiedu, the bank is still growing and customers should have a sense of expectation because surprises are on the way. 
“The greatest disservice we can do is to think that we have arrived”, he warned. 
Story by Ghana|myjoyonline.com|Edwin Appiah| [email protected]
